features: [WIDE APPLICATION] - The W10872845 Dishwasher Pump Filter is specially designed for Whirlpool, Kenmore, Amana, Kitchen-aid dishwasher. W10872845 is equivalent to W10425171, W10455263, W10234631, W10393351, 8579307, W10693534, W10465374, W10465373, W10393352, W10393354, WPW10693534, W10465377, W10465379, W10056425, W10056426, W10142911, W10300746, W10465375, W10465378, AP6030094, PS11759673

[EASY TO INSTALL] - No tools are necessary. All you need to do is open the dishwasher lid, remove the old filter cup, and insert the new one in its correct position. However, it's important to disconnect both the power and water supply of the dishwasher before beginning any repairs.

[FIX SITUATION] - The W10872845 dishwasher filter is designed to remove food particles and debris from the water, preventing the drain from becoming clogged. This filter is highly effective in addressing the most common dishwasher issues, such as improper dish cleaning and drainage. In addition, replacing an old filter that has become moldy or gross can be easily accomplished with this product.

[PREMIUM QUALITY] -The W10872845 dishwasher filter cup is constructed using high-quality, flexible ABS plastic that has been thoroughly tested by the manufacturer. This product features a gray plastic top and bottom and is designed to provide superior efficiency and durability, ensuring a longer service life for your dishwasher. The manufacturer has prioritized the best possible quality in the construction of this filter cup, making it an excellent choice for anyone seeking a reliable and long-lasting dishwasher filter.
[1 Year Warranty] - We are confident in the W10872845 filter cup replacement and offer a 365-day warranty. If there are any problems with the product, you can get a full refund. Buy with confidence!

reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace the filter in my whirlpool dishwasher. The filter works as described. It has been several months since I purchased it. I feel I need to rinse it more often than the original filter. I plan on purchasing another one to keep on hand to replace this one when it doesn't rinse off easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replacement Filter Looks, Works Like Original
reviews.reviewText: My first experience with a dishwasher pump filter came in 2019 when my Maytag dishwasher started leaving too much food residue on the dishes. When I consulted the manual, I learned the pump filter must be cleaned periodically. I didn’t even know what a pump filter was, or that a dishwasher had them. The pump filter in my dishwasher was a filthy mess, so I ordered a replacement Whirlpool filter through Amazon. (Whirlpool made Maytag, which the manufacturer later discontinued.) Fast forward to 2023, and I now have a newer Amana dishwasher that uses the same filter. Although I cleaned the filter on the new dishwasher as needed, I recognized the value of having a spare or replacement available. So, I ordered the Binazon replacement filter. It has been working flawlessly for the last month.Appliance and equipment manufacturers have long insisted that you order only “authentic” replacement parts. But many people now realize that generic replacements often do as good a job at a much lower price. The Whirlpool pump filter prevents food residue from going down the drain and clogging the internal plumbing (or being splashed back onto the dishes). It’s a cylindrical tube with a mesh coating that fits snugly, but not too tightly, into a hole at the bottom of the dishwasher. Give it a turn, and it locks into place. Turn it the other way, and you can pull it out for cleaning.The Binazon filter replaces the filters in a wide variety of Whirlpool, Amana, Kenmore, and KitchenAid dishwashers. (The latter three brands are all manufactured by Whirlpool.) When I compared the replacement Binazon filter to the original Whirlpool one, they seemed almost identical to the naked eye.The mesh filter on the Binazon filter felt the same as the original Whirlpool filter. The only difference between the two was some small print on the plastic top of the Whirlpool filter. That print showed which direction to turn the filter to lock or unlock it. The Binazon filter had no similar writing. However, installing or replacing the Binazon filter is relatively intuitive, even without the printed guidance. I’ve had the Binazon filter in place for about a month. The dishes are clean, and the filter shows no wear or damage. The dishwasher sounds the same when it’s running.Writing a review for a dishwasher is easy. There are many things, good or bad, to note. Writing a review for a single replacement component part is not. All I can do is try to find differences in appearance and performance. The only one I found was the absence of some non-essential guidance printing from the original filter. The Binazon filter does everything the original Whirlpool filter does (I still have both in good condition for performance comparisons) at a cost and convenience savings. You won’t go wrong ordering this replacement part for your Whirlpool-manufactured dishwasher.NOTE: I received this product as part of the Amazon Vine program. However, the contents of this review are entirely my own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This replacement filter fit my Whirlpool dishwasher perfectly. Mine was getting pretty gross so it was nice to be able to easily replace it with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This filter is the EXACT same as my stock original filter. I have a Kenmore Elite but not sure of the model number. I simply wanted two in case one breaks and to have a clean one ready to go until I clean the other one.It is a process to clean this filter. I use a sponge with scrubbing material on one side. Your standard kitchen sink type of two-sided sponge. I am tempted to get an old toothbrush to use as well. There are a lot of surfaces to this filter that collect debris. That makes it difficult to clean 100%. I am confident that a complete cleaning is not necessarily needed, but I try to get it spotless.I am always careful to not tear or rip the fine mesh of this filter. I have owned the dishwasher for many years and have never compromised the filter cartridge, but I am always careful when cleaning it. You would think that you could just run it through a cycle but then the other filter would collect what comes off of this one. So, I ran a wash without a filter, but I think that defeats the purpose of cleaning the dishes.The solution for me at least is to have another filter on hand to soak and thoroughly clean before I use it again. This eliminates any 'down time' between washing. This filter cartridge appears well made and sturdy. Identical to the original. And offered at a great price. Good product. Good value.
